main event: A bright white light, the size of a grapefruit, was observed hovering and then suddenly disappearing at Tyndall Air Force Base, Florida on September 18, 1960.
interesting points: The object was traveling on a steady course and was very bright, but had no trail.
The object seemed to be under intelligent control and operated differently from satellites observed.
The object was observed for 10-15 minutes by two competent observers.
The object appeared stationary at first, then moved north slowly, and finally moved in a fast erratic course southwest before disappearing.
The angle or elevation of the object was about 55 degrees, and it disappeared suddenly.
sighted object: bright white light the size of a grapefruit
